description: This sometimes steep (signed) trail will lead you down to a point of land known as McKenzie Bight. This trail is only a part of the 25+ km network that runs through Gowlland Todd Provincial Park. The views from the point are truly spectacular.
directions: Drive up Willis Point road past Durrance Lake and turn right onto Ross-Durrance Road. After about 400m you will come to a BC Parks/CRD Parks parking lot.
title: McKenzie Bight
